entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High plus 1.
